name: Doom Unity (Unity FPS Micro Game Remix)
name_original: Doom Unity (Unity FPS Micro Game Remix)
description:
This is my personal remix and modification of Doom-like FPS MicroGame created by Unity.  

Features that I have added are:

  1. Higher FOV
  2. Post Processing
  3. Three Levels
  4. New Menu
  5. UI Colours
  6. Higher Enemy Difficulty
  7. Weapon Variants
  8. New Objectives
  9. New Maps

I plan to implement a few more changes next week, with the main new feature being and additional level with platforming!

Here is the link to the FPS Micro Game Template developed by Unity https://learn.unity.com/project/fps-template

(The WebGL embed failed to launch for strange reasons, so a download file will be provided whilst I fix the embedded version)
